dublin_core.dcvalue: No intervention has been shown to be effective in preventing repetition of self harm In the 6 month follow up of a large randomised controlled trial we previously reported no effectiveness of the provision of a card offering 24 h crisis telephone consultation on repetition of self harm However there was a possible benefit among those presenting following a first episode OR 0 64 95 CI 0 34 1 22 Here we report the 12 month follow up of the trial The results confirm no overall benefit of the intervention OR 1 19 95 CI 0 85 1 67 Among those with a first episode of self harm the possible benefit of the intervention had diminished OR 0 89 95 CI 0 52 1 52 although a modest effect cannot be excluded
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-10T17:41:09Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2005-08-01
The British journal of psychiatry : the journal of mental science
Crisis card following self-harm: 12-month follow-up of a randomised controlled trial.
